short_summary: The purpose of this Request for Proposal is to acquire one or more RF Power Amplifier Modules to be delivered to Health Canada.  The module must operate in the frequency range of 20 to 38 GHz. The term of the Contract is from date of contract to one year after delivery and acceptance.
full_summary:
![Tender Notice](https://via.placeholder.com/800x200)
================ Autosummary

**Tender Name**
---------------

RF Power Amplifier Module

**Reference Number**
------------------

WS3609362853-Doc3734230712

**Procurement Category**
-----------------------

Goods and Services

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

Competitive Bidding

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Required Goods**
-------------------

Laboratory and scientific equipment, specifically:

* Radio Frequency (RF) power amplifier module(s) operating in the minimum frequency range of 20 to 38 GHz

**Contract Status**
-------------------

This tender has expired.

**Closing Date**
----------------

29 Nov 2022, 14:00 EST

**Expected Contract Period**
----------------------------

From 30 Sep 2022, to 31 Mar 2024

**Government Entity**
---------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Mandated Buyer**
------------------

 Department of Health (HC)

**Description**
---------------

This tender is for the purchase of one or more Radio Frequency (RF) power amplifier module(s) operating in the minimum frequency range of 20 to 38 GHz. All documents must be submitted to Public Services and Procurement Canada by 29 Nov 2022. For more information, please visit the Government of Canada’s tendering portal or contact: 
Yessica Karnali (SPAC/PSPC), Wijaya Putri,  Tel:***, Email: [yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Regions**
-------------

Canada
